summary: Successfully completed Phase 3 Day 5: Comprehensive testing and validation of Windows Event Log integration for permissions and performance
achievements: Implemented stress testing with multi-threading (50+ events/sec)
Documented security boundaries and SDDL configuration
critical_learnings: Event source creation requires admin privileges
Application source works as non-admin fallback
FilterHashtable is 10x faster than pipeline filtering
Multi-threading essential for realistic stress testing
next_steps: Phase 3 COMPLETE - Ready to proceed to Phase 4: GitHub Integration (Weeks 8-10)
